data.title: Tacoma Film Camp
data.text:
Member Discount:

Use the coupon code Member24 at checkout. We will verify membership status of the adult registering. If you are unsure if you are a current member, please give us a call at 253-572-6062 or email info@grandcinema.com and we can assist!

WEEKLY SCHEDULE

Monday-Thursday

Daily lessons, activities, challenges exploring technical, creative and imaginative aspects of telling stories through film. Work through the many stages of filmmaking from pre to post-production, turning an idea created Monday or Tuesday into a completed, original short film.

Friday

Complete post-production and share completed work with friends and family at a premiere screening! Family and friends invited to arrive at 2:45pm for a 3:00pm start.

Drop-off is at 9 AM; pick-up at 4 PM, Monday-Friday.

Doors open at 8:50 AM and there will not be an opportunity for early drop off.

QUESTIONS OR WOULD LIKE TO REQUEST A SCHOLARSHIP SPOT?? PLEASE CONTACT DIRECTOR OF EDUCATION PAUL RICHTER AT PAUL@GRANDCINEMA.COM

THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS

Tacoma Creates is a voter-approved initiative to increase access to arts, culture, heritage, and science experiences throughout Tacoma by reducing barriers to access and expanding offerings, particularly for underserved youth.

Would your organization or business like to sponsor film camp, including scholarships? Please reach out to Rachel Marecle, Director of Community Development, at rachel@grandcinema.com.
